about_the_game:
Are You Satisfied With Your Current Situation?

Are You Feeling the Pressure From Life?

Are You Trapped By Life?

A girl accidentally came to a world full of different caves, and she and a smiley face cube were looking for a way out. You will control this little girl to pass the levels and reach new caves one after another.

The appearance of the cave is determined by the girl's cognition and memory.

[Key Features]

Explore caves, solving puzzles and find the exit.

Having conversations with your smiley face cube fellow in each cave/level.

16 levels in total

4 different caves, 4 different topics(school, family, workplace, marriage).

[tips]

Keep an eye on the shiny areas in each cave/level.

In order to make the exit/portal appear, the completion degree has to reach 80%, which mean you have to dig at least 80% of the soils in each cave.

You may have to grab the keys to unlock the locks in the cave first.

You may face spiders and other dangerous items, be careful!!
detailed_description:
Are You Satisfied With Your Current Situation?

Are You Feeling the Pressure From Life?

Are You Trapped By Life?

A girl accidentally came to a world full of different caves, and she and a smiley face cube were looking for a way out. You will control this little girl to pass the levels and reach new caves one after another.

The appearance of the cave is determined by the girl's cognition and memory.

[Key Features]

Explore caves, solving puzzles and find the exit.

Having conversations with your smiley face cube fellow in each cave/level.

16 levels in total

4 different caves, 4 different topics(school, family, workplace, marriage).

[tips]

Keep an eye on the shiny areas in each cave/level.

In order to make the exit/portal appear, the completion degree has to reach 80%, which mean you have to dig at least 80% of the soils in each cave.

You may have to grab the keys to unlock the locks in the cave first.

You may face spiders and other dangerous items, be careful!!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, Intel
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Trapped

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, or 10
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Don't be TRAPPED by your life.
